game.beginning: The world of Eridoria, a land of ancient magic and mythical creatures, has been plagued by a terrible curse that has brought about an eternal winter.
game.ending: The player must embark on a perilous journey to defeat the dark sorcerer, Xarath, who is responsible for the curse, and restore balance to the world.
game.synopsis: In the frozen wasteland of Eridoria, you play as a young apprentice mage named Lyra. Your village has been destroyed by a group of ruthless bandits, and your mentor has fallen into a deep coma due to a mysterious affliction. With no other choice but to flee, you set out on an epic quest to find the source of the eternal winter and put an end to it. Along the way, you'll encounter fierce warriors, cunning rogues, and powerful magic users who will aid or hinder your progress.
game.title: Eternal Winter
